programme.title: Freezing weather and earthquakes in 1994
programme.short_synopsis: The extreme weather of 1994, and the end of the Iran-Contra investigation.
programme.medium_synopsis: The exceptionally cold weather scouring America, the earthquake in southern California and the conclusion of the Iran-Contra affair investigation are discussed by Alistair Cooke.
